channel.title: Sorry for double topic But How To Make NPC drop Nothing Work For ME!
channel.description: autospawn.cfg : spawn = 397 3088 3492 0 0 0 0 0 1 Npcdrop: npcdrop = 397 0 526 1 2132 1 1739 1 and every npc dosent Drop Nothing its like server with out drops what to do?? Thank you - :eek:

item.title: Sorry for double topic But How To Make NPC drop Nothing Work For ME!
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

That’s enough.

The community doesn’t have to provide help, so even if people aren’t giving you a lot you should try to utilize it anyway. Make sure you read other posts fully as well, usman for example prompted that you’ve not provided enough detail such as what source you’re using etc.

Also, for future reference, if you post a topic which makes no sense and provides zero detail I’ll just remove it.

Read full topic

item.title: Sorry for double topic But How To Make NPC drop Nothing Work For ME!
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Your drops are disabled.

I don’t know which source you’re using and the modifications you’ve made. If your source provider doesn’t know or doesn’t want to share how to enable drops, then it’s not worth using that source.
